other_tests.findings: Typical T wave alternans, markedly prolonged QT-intervals (RR = 570 ms, QT = 501 ms, QTc = 664 ms), 2:1 AV block.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At age 5, ECG showed slightly prolonged QTc (RR = 559 ms, QT = 346 ms, QTc = 462 ms).

other_tests.findings: Identified a novel heterozygous missense variant p.R412M in CACNA1C, confirmed by Sanger method, pathogenic variant according to ACMG guidelines.
